children.title: dashboard.html
children.summary: This is a financial dashboard displaying total balance, spending, savings, and recent transactions with navigation to AI insights, goals, and profile sections.

children.title: investment-recommendations.html
children.summary: This is an investment recommendations page, providing personalized portfolio suggestions, risk assessment, and investment strategies, along with educational resources and a call to action to start investing.

children.title: financial-goals.html
children.summary: This is a financial dashboard displaying user goals, progress, and performance with navigation to different sections, including financial goals, AI insights, and profile information.

children.title: create-new-goal.html
children.summary: This is a goal creation page where users can choose their financial objective, select a goal type, and view recommendations, with a call-to-action to continue to the details section.

children.title: profile.html
children.summary: This is a user profile page displaying account information, financial health score, and navigation to different sections such as account management, app preferences, and support resources.

children.title: ai-insights.html
children.summary: This is a personal finance dashboard displaying AI-powered investment insights, spending trends, budget alerts, and financial goals with navigation to different sections.

children.title: product_charter.md
children.summary: FinSmart AI is an intelligent mobile companion providing personalized financial recommendations through AI-powered insights, making smart money management accessible to everyone.

children.title: persona_primary.md
children.summary: Maya Chen, a 28-year-old marketing coordinator, seeks personalized financial guidance to optimize her money and build wealth for her future.

children.title: persona_secondary.md
children.summary: The Secondary User profile outlines Carlos, a cautious beginner, seeking low-risk financial strategies to grow savings while prioritizing family security and stability.

children.title: create_new_goal_screen_plan.md
children.summary: The goal creation wizard guides users in setting realistic financial objectives with AI-powered recommendations and planning assistance for various goal types.

children.title: investment_recommendations_screen_plan.md
children.summary: This investment guide provides personalized strategies, risk assessments, educational content, and implementation guidance for optimal portfolio management based on user risk tolerance and goals.

children.title: prd.md
children.summary: The AI-Powered Financial Guidance Mobile App provides personalized financial recommendations, education, and planning tools to help users make informed decisions and build wealth, serving both ambitious savers and cautious beginners.

children.title: user_flow.md
children.summary: This document outlines the user flow of the FinSmart AI Mobile App, describing core pages, navigation, and detail pages for financial management and planning.

children.title: profile_screen_plan.md
children.summary: The Profile section provides user account management, app customization, and access to personal settings, security options, and preferences.

children.title: dashboard_screen_plan.md
children.summary: The Dashboard provides a financial overview, displaying key metrics, recent activity, and AI-driven insights for personalized financial management.

children.title: ai_insights_screen_plan.md
children.summary: AI Insights offers personalized financial recommendations, educational content, and AI-powered guidance tailored to individual financial situations.

children.title: financial_goals_screen_plan.md
children.summary: Financial goal management interface with AI-powered planning, tracking, and achievement tools for various financial objectives.

children.title: FinSmart Clean Mobile.style-guide.md
children.summary: The FinSmart Clean Mobile Style Guide outlines design principles for a financial application, covering colors, typography, layout, and components to ensure a professional, trustworthy, and accessible user interface.
